MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY8 postcode area of Leven, affecting properties in Links Place and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:48pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further fault investigations required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:20pm on Saturday 27th February 2021.
